title: Indonesia Stock Rout Deepens After MSCI Warning
description: Indonesian stocks sank deeper on Thursday after an MSCI warning over market investability sparked the worst two-day sell-off in nearly three decades. Still, Mohit Mirpuri, Senior Partner at SGMC Capital, says he has not sold his positions in the market and that he sees no chance of a downgrade. (Source: Bloomberg)
